message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. It holds immense value for us, reflecting our dedication to excellence and innovation. Given its importance, we believe it would be a significant asset for you as well. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $1,250,000. This is an opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a competitive rate. Please let us know if you are interested in discussing further details.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the product, $1,250,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending at this time. I'm willing to pay $1,000,000 for it, which is still a good deal for you, considering the value you place on it. Let me know if you're open to discussing that price.

Thank you for your response, Bob. After careful consideration, we've decided to adjust our offer based on your feedback. We are now willing to consider $1,100,000 for the product. This is a fair compromise, allowing us to recoup a portion of our investment while providing you with an excellent opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a reasonable price. We look forward to your response and hope to facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction.
